Summary: Five extremely bright lights in a row very big only saw for a second or second and a half
divs: Sighting DetailsI just kind of look around when I drive and I just saw it. Five extremely bright lights in a horizontal row very big only saw them for a second or a second and a half. I could not pull over because I was in my car. When I went down a side street the trees were to tall and I could not find it. I would like to know if anyone else in the area saw this as well. I just can't believe no one else saw it and I would really like to know what you find out. I would estimate from first light to the last light it has to be hundreds of feet long because it was over a mile away. I couldn't believe what I was seeing.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Norwood
There were no other sightings in Norwood on or around March 31st 2013
